dateTodo.description: Date when the resiliation will take effect

needModemReturn.description: If the customer needs to return his modem

registrationDate.description: Date when the resiliation was done

xdsl.RadiusConnectionLog.description: Log entry of an auth attempt to the radius server

order.Price.description: Price with it's currency and textual representation

possibleRenewPeriod.description: All the possible renew period of your service in month

protocol.description: Protocol of the port mapping (TCP / UDP)

taskId.description: ID of the ongoing todo (NULL if none)

name.description: Name of the port mapping entry

externalPortStart.description: External Port that the modem will listen on. List of externalPorts not available for now in the API : 8, 21, 68, 5060, 21800-21805, 51005

internalClient.description: The IP address of the destination of the packets

allowedRemoteIp.description: An ip which will access to the defined rule. Default : no restriction applied

internalPort.description: The port on the Internal Client that will get the connections

id.description: ID of the port mapping entry

channelMode.description: How the channel is chosen (Auto / Manual)

SSID.description: Service Set Identifier of the WLAN interface

channel.description: Choice of a channel (When chosen, channelMode is set to Manual)

resiliationDate.description: Date at which the access will be resiliated

engageDate.description: Date until which the customer is engaged

lnsRateLimit.description: Rate limit on the LNS in kbps - Only available if canApplyLnsRateLimit capability is set to true - Must be a multiple of 64 - Min value 64 / Max value 100032

monitoring.description: Whether or not this access is monitored

xdsl.PendingAction.description: Scheduled action before the next renewal of the service

terminationDatetime.description: Termination datetime of the return merchandise authorisation ticket

newMerchandise.description: New merchandise brand in case of exchange

shippingContact.description: Contact information related to the delivery shipping in case of exchange

offerTypeNew.description: Offer type of the new merchandise in case of exchange

offerTypeOld.description: Offer type of the return merchandise

receptionDatetime.description: Reception datetime of the return merchandise authorisation ticket

addressSource.description: How did the device got its IP address

informationDate.description: The date time of the last update of thoses informations

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the device

active.description: The state of this device on the modem

hostName.description: Host name given by the device to the modem

leaseTimeRemaining.description: The remaining time in seconds of the DHCP lease of this device (-1 means infinite)

interfaceType.description: On which interface is connected the device

xdsl.DslamPortStatusEnum.description: Different states of a DSLAM port

xdsl.DslamPortLog.description: A message log from the DSLAM

numberOfOccurrences.description: The number of times this message occured between date and lastOccurrenceDate

lastOccurrenceDate.description: The last time this message occured

lineHead.description: Identifier of the head of the cable from the MDF

name.description: Name of the DHCP Static lease

xdsl.orderFollowup.StepNameEnum.description: The status of an order step

xdsl.xdslModemConfig.EasyFirewallLevelEn.description: Level of the Firewall ( BlockAll will block all connections, Normal will block all incoming connections except those in PortMapping and let go all outgoing connections , Disabled will disable all the Firewall and let all incoming or outgoing connections pass through )

service.RenewType.description: Map a possible renew for a specific service

forced.description: The service forced to be renewed

deleteAtExpiration.description: The service will be deleted at expiration

xdsl.xdslModemConfig.ChannelModeEnum.description: How the WiFi channel is selected

xdsl.AccessCapabilities.description: Describe the capabilities of the Access

xdsl.orderFollowup.Step.description: A step of the order process

xdsl.ModemCapabilities.description: Describe the capabilities of the Modem

xdsl.AccessDiagnosticCapabilities.description: Describe the capabilities of the access diagnostic

mtuSize.description: Size of the Maximum Transmission Unit on the modem's interfaces

lastCwmpRequestDate.description: Last time the modem made a CWMP request to the Auto Configuration Server

ipv6Support.description: Whether or not the modem supports IPv6

managedByOvh.description: Whether or not the user can configure his modem via OVH Interface (will lock telnet and local HTTP configuration page)

dmzIP.description: IP Address of the DMZ (To modify or delete the DMZ IP on the modem, a re-configuration of your modem has to be made, your configuration will be maintained, but you will lose your connection a few minutes)

easyFirewallLevel.description: Level of the FireWall on the modem

isBridged.description: Whether or not the modem is in bridge mode. To pass from bridge mode to routed mode, a reset is necessary. If the modem is managedByOvh, the bridge state will be kept after a reset

xdsl.xdslModemConfig.ProtocolTypeEnum.description: Type of protocol for the Port Mapping

xdsl.FaultRepairTimeEnum.description: Maximum time needed to repair a landline

length.description: The length of this section in meters

diameter.description: The diameter of this section in millimeters

isActiveOnLns.description: Is the access active on its primary or secondary LNS

incident.description: Is there an ongoing genericIncident on the access ?

remaining.description: Remaining number of diagnostic for this access

concentrationPoint.description: Data to identify the line at the concentration point

distance.description: Distance in meters from the DSLAM

directDistribution.description: True if the line is directly wired on the DSLAM

portability.description: Whether the line number has been ported to OVH, to be used with VoIP service

mitigation.description: Mitigation of the line in dB

lineSectionsLength.description: Detailed information about the sections between the DSLAM and the telephone jack

syncUp.description: The upload synchronisation on the DSLAM in Kbps

syncDown.description: The download synchronisation on the DSLAM in Kbps

originalNumber.description: The number used to place the order. Null if the same as the current number.

monthlyPrice.description: New abo price after the deconsolidation

engagement.description: Duration of month the access will be engaged
